version_description:
Fixed "blue screen" on some missions!
Smoothed out bridges in City level!
New bus!
Reimagined City level!
Open your bus doors any time and anywhere!
Reduced download and installation size!
Additional small fixes and improvements!

Added new american school bus!
Audio improvements!

Added new bus!
Added brake and turn lights to AI vehicles!
Added hazard lights!
Fixed some intersections not showing directions

Added new taxi!
Added mini map!
Improved top speed for most vehicles!

Added new taxi!
Added mini map!
Improved top speed for most vehicles!
Hotfix:
Fixed mini map button location
Fixed reversing sound not working

Added "Route maker" - create your own bus routes!
Added new articulated bus!
Wider corners in City level.
Improved taxi gameplay!

- Added new bus!
- Added semi-automatic and manual transmission options
- Improved "Suburban", "Country", and "Mountains" maps
- Improved vehicle mirror resolution and angles
- Fixed some vehicles not progressing to "Training Yard" level
- More smaller fixes and improvements

- added new bus with 6 turning wheels!
- added functionality to open bus doors separately!
- improved gearbox & drivetrain
- fixed route maker direction arrow issue
- reduced save game size
- improved AI vehicle behaviour, not perfect, but step to right direction

- Added rain weather effect
- Added windscreen wipers
- Added steering sensitivity options
- Improved semi-automatic / automatic gearbox logic
- Fixed infinite "Prepare .." in "Training Yard"
- Fixed reverse sound not working with automatic / semi-automatic gearboxes
- Additional other small improvements and fixes

- Added 2 new buses!
- Added different colour for "open" door buttons
- Additional small fixes and improvements
- new bus!

- Added new bus!
- Added possibility to disable rain
- Removed local save game option when loading save game from server
- Other small improvements

- Added new bus!
- Added possibility to disable rain
- Removed local save game option when loading save game from server
- Fixed black screen in 'Snowy Mountains'

- Added new bus!
- Expanded City level with highway.
- New characters and accessories.
- Fixed semi-automatic and manual gearboxes not working after changing route in route maker.

- Added new bus!
- Map expansion to 'Suburbs', 'Country' and 'Mountain' levels!
- Changed level progression to be more player friendly!

- Added new bus!
- Map expansion to 'Suburbs', 'Country' and 'Mountain' levels!
- Changed level progression to be more player friendly!
- Fixed multiple issues on Country level

- Added new bus
- Fixed map issues

Added new bus!
Added new map!
High quality bus paints!

- Fixed direction arrows not visible in low quality settings
- Fixed passengers walking on bus roof

Added dynamic LCD-s to buses.
Added engine start / stop button.
Added faster windscreen wiper speed
Updated tree models.
Optimized run time memory usage.
Fixed headlight flares visible inside vehicle.
Fixed progression not unlocking as intended for some levels / vehicles.
Fixed Gulliver mirrors not showing rear wheels.
Fixed Ikarus invisible back door issue.
Fixed Sprinter doors not opening.
- added new map with new assets

- Added new bus!
- Added handbrake
- Added lowering suspension
- Added stop request
- Fixed traffic vehicle wheels

Added 1 regular bus, one van and a bi-articulated bus
Added driver seat adjustment
Optimized memory usage (-25%)
Added distance counter to taxi missions
Adjusted XP earning and vehicle unlock values
Adjusted menu camera locations
Improved 'RouteMaker' starting map position
Improved dashboard dials accuracy
More traffic in Country and Mountains levels
Increased Suburban / Country / Mountains passenger XP values
Workaround for controls freezing issue
Fixed 3D audio issues
And much more!
Added Citron L & Arctic 405

Added 1 regular bus, one van and a bi-articulated bus
Added driver seat adjustment
Optimized memory usage (-25%)
Added distance counter to taxi missions
Adjusted XP earning and vehicle unlock values
Adjusted menu camera locations
Improved 'RouteMaker' starting map position
Improved dashboard dials accuracy
More traffic in Country and Mountains levels
Increased Suburban / Country / Mountains passenger XP values
Workaround for controls freezing issue
Fixed 3D audio issues
And much more!
Added Citron L & Arctic 405

- Added new bus
- Lots of improvements under the hood

Fixed route maker issues
Fixed loading screen

Added 4 new buses
Added bus stops to mini map
Reworked vehicle unlocking system
Bug fixes and improvements
